Package ohos.distributedschedule.interwork

Provides interfaces and classes for registering and unregistering device state callbacks, obtaining information about all devices or a specified device on the distributed network, querying application information, and initializing the distributed execution framework. You can use this package to perform the following operations:

  • Call DeviceManager#registerDeviceStateCallback(IDeviceStateCallback) to register device state callbacks so that your application can receive notifications when a device on the distributed network becomes online or offline and call DeviceManager#unregisterDeviceStateCallback(IDeviceStateCallback) to unregister these callbacks.
  • Call DeviceManager#getDeviceList(int) to obtain information about all devices on the distributed network.
  • Call DeviceManager#getDeviceInfo(String) to obtain information about a specified device on the distributed network.
  • Call DeviceManager#queryRemoteAbilityByIntent(Intent) to obtain AbilityInfo information about a non-HarmonyOS application on the distributed network.
  • Call DeviceManager#initDistributedEnvironment(String, IInitCallback) to initialize the distributed execution framework on a device with a callback specified to notify your application of the initialization result. After the cross-device task is complete, call DeviceManager#unInitDistributedEnvironment(String, IInitCallback) to deactivate the distributed execution framework.
Since:
3
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDeviceStateCallback
    Provides callbacks that can be invoked when the state of a device on the distributed network changes to online or offline.
    IInitCallback
    Provides callbacks to be invoked upon a successful or failed attempt to initialize the distributed execution framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeviceInfo
    Provides methods for setting and obtaining the network ID, device name, device type, and device state of a device on the distributed network.
    DeviceManager
    Provides methods for managing devices on the distributed network, including registering and unregistering callbacks for notifications of device online and offline, obtaining information about all remote devices or a specified remote device, querying information about an remote application based on a specified Intent, and initializing the distributed execution framework for a device.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceInfo.DeviceState
    Enumerates online and offline states of a device on the distributed network.
    DeviceInfo.DeviceType
    Enumerates types of a device on the distributed network.
